content: also available at free-crochet com 1 **note** you must register on the freepatterns website to access the free patterns gauge first 5 rnds = 3 in diameter one of two patterns in small red doilies the other pattern is radiant starlit 2 originally published in crochet world magazine vol 19 1996 450 yds needed to make both doilies for a very similar pattern with 7 points dating from the late 1930s or early 1940s see the star doily #219 /patterns/library/star-doily-219 1 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_doilies/small_red_doilies/ 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/radiant-starlit
